title: Yatri (Kochi) Ride Booking App
description:
It is a community initiative to make your ride experience hassle-free and affordable.
It is built and supported by techies and thought leaders passionate about building a sustainable, long-term, and OPEN solution for mobility.
Whether you need a ride daily to commute to the office and back or to go out for a weekend stroll, Yatri will be a perfect solution to make your commute easy!
Book a ride with Yatri and enjoy commuting without paying any commissions.

Why another ride-booking app?

Ride-hailing apps have made our lives easy, but the high commissions have dug a hole in drivers' and customers pockets.
Drivers' earnings are badly affected due to high commissions, and drivers can't operate sustainably. This has resulted in the unavailability of rides during peak time and poor rider experience. And somewhere, we all believed there was no solution to this problem.
The long-term sustainable solution is an open, community-first platform that connects riders to drivers directly.
To achieve this, we began building Yatri- A ride booking app built on open protocols in collaboration with the drivers.

What is unique about Yatri?

Zero-commission ride booking app where you pay less, and drivers earn more

100% payment goes directly to the Driver without any cuts or middlemen

Built-in collaboration with Drivers and Citizens

Built on open-protocols

100% Open source | 100% Transparent | 100% Open data

Community-first approach

Long-term sustainable solution

How to book an auto online through Namma yatri auto booking app

🚕Download Yatri ride booking app
🚕Signup on the app
🚕Setup your pickup and drop location
🚕Choose your ride
🚕Start your ride
🚕Pay the driver directly through UPI or cash

🚕Feature highlights🚕

🚕Quick and easy booking: Install - Signup - Book- Pay & Repeat, you can book ride online at your doorstep.
🚕Fast, Easy & Safe: Find an auto ride easily with a few taps on your mobile and enjoy a hassle-free ride.
🚕Choose your ride: The choice is yours! You can choose from the best-rated rides available near you
🚕Save your favourite locations: You no longer need to set the location every time you book a ride; you can pick it up from your marked locations without hassle.
🚕Repeat Ride: Book your office ride every day without hassle. Click on "Repeat ride" instead of entering your pickup and drop location all over again.
🚕Navigation and Real-time tracking: Track your Ride in real-time and know exactly when your ride will arrive and where you're commuting with the best-in-class technology from Google Maps.
🚕Affordable fares: Our fares are fair and affordable, so you don't have to worry about overpaying for your Ride. No haggling. No waste of time.
🚕Consistent Pricing: No extra charges during peak hours.
🚕Direct Payment: Pay directly to the Driver in cash or UPI.
🚕 100% Transparency: No hidden charges; you can check the rate card to know the breakdown of your Ride. Rate the Ride and give feedback for improvement.
🚕 Multiple languages to choose from – Access Yatri in English & Malayalam

Yatri is currently available in Kerala.

summary: Zero commission auto booking. 100% Direct payment to drivers. 100% Open-source.
recentChanges: Yatri is now in new colors to make your commute seamlessly. And as usual, bugs have been shown the door.
comments: I'm not able to sign up now, shows there is some error. Plus, once I booked for a cab through another number, and the app was updating, the cab came and I couldn't see the details as the app was not opening. Since updates, there has been issues with this app.

This app recommends 2 wheeler routes for a cab and when you take the actual route, it overcharges you. Customer service gives blunt replies like We will look into it or we are trying to fix the maps! Your money wasted. No refunds, not even an offer of refund! Uninstalling. Update: Thank you for automated reply but where are my refunds?

Not even good for one star. They had charged my extra 60 rupees stating the ride is 2.3 km longer although the destination location is correct. I really fed up with this app and don't recommend anyone to use this fraudulent app.

Horrible experience. Got fooled by the initial price while booking. It showed me 1600 for my trip when started, so I booked it since ola was showing 1800. But after reaching my place, the fair changed to 2060. 400rs more. Never seen such a drastic change in the price in any of the apps. Used it for the first time, and that would be the last as well. Should have gone for ola, atleast I could have saved 200rs. Don't fall for the fake reviews in play store

Driver charged more than the fare shown in app. Emailed the support team of app but no response even after 2 days. No use of support team. Please don't use this app. Edit: Their support email id is invalid.
